name: The Hamburger Maker Lite
description:
This is the nativ iPad version from our famous game, the hamburger maker. This version expanded with some new features, example the ingredients rotatable and scalable for the better Hamburger. Prepare your own burger a variety ingredients to choose from. All kind of sauces, vegetables, cheeses, meats, fishes and other specialities want to become a perfect hamburger on your plate. No matter what part of the world you live, you're vegetarian or you love meat, you will find some delicacy of your taste. Serve the perfect dish on the plate of your choice and make it unique with some accessories. Add a personal message or a picture and send it to us in e-mail or share on facebook. Bon Appetit!
In the payed version available more ingredients!
